Class UserLoginPage

java.lang.Object
application.framework.BasePage
application.pages.user.UserLoginPage
public class UserLoginPage extends BasePage
The UserLoginPage class provides a login interface for users to access their accounts. It validates the user's credentials and navigates to the appropriate page upon successful login.
Author:
Dhruv
